docna.cdata!:
Colombia - Guatape II Hydroelectric Project
            : Loan 0874 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Colombia - Guatape II
            Hydroelectric Project : Loan 0874 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Colombia - Guatape II Hydroelectric Project
            : Loan 0874 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Colombia - Guatape II
            Hydroelectric Project : Loan 0874 - Guarantee Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of (i) construction
            of the 280 MW second stage of the Guatape hydroelectric
            power station; (ii) a 230 kV transmission line from Guatape
            to load centers; (iii) expansion of the distribution system
            in EPM's service area.
